'''Fragrant Cedar Wood'''  is obtained by cutting down Cedar. It is an item used to craft [[furnishings]].

==How to Obtain==
Cedar Trees can be found in [[Wolvendom]], [[Starfell Valley]], [[Springvale]], and [[Brightcrown Mountains]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=180 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Trivia==
* Despite typically being found in Mondstadt, there is one single Cedar tree found on [[Watatsumi Island]], next to the cliff overlooking the entrance to [[Enkanomiya]] (pictured below). This tree is also the final destination of a particular [[Electro Seelie]] which takes a long path across Watatsumi Island.
* [[Steak]] can be grilled over Fragrant Cedar Wood to bring out more flavor. This is one of [[Kaeya]]'s favorite foods.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Taste of Home}}</ref>
